subject: Project Spotlight: A Light, Bright & Beautiful Finish in Rockdale
preview: We've just wrapped up a beautiful home in Rockdale that showcases how to mix terrazzo-look tiles, warm marble mosaics, and timeless outdoor stone finishes.    From soft terrazzo tones in the bathroom

full_threads.body:
We've just wrapped up a beautiful home in Rockdale that showcases how to mix terrazzo-look tiles, warm marble mosaics, and timeless outdoor stone finishes.

From soft terrazzo tones in the bathroom to bold marble mosaics, clean whites in the laundry, and dreamy limestone outdoors - this Rockdale project has it all. Want to see how it all comes together?

Read the full story on the blog.
